original_title: ギーツエクストラ 仮面ライダーパンクジャック
overview: Geats Extra: Kamen Rider PunkJack is an upcoming TTFC exclusive web special set within the continuity of Kamen Rider Geats.  The special explores the origins of the Desire Grand Prix and how Win Hareruya became a member of their staff as Kamen Rider PunkJack.
title: Geats Extra: Kamen Rider PunkJack
